name: Tethered (itch) (Gpixl)
description:
Explore space with a remote-controlled spacecraft! Be careful though, it has limited signal strength, so you can't go too far. You can wait for the orbits to line up just right for you to explore a planet's surface.

I was hoping to add more detail to the planets, and more of them in general, but I ran out of time. Oh well

Music, art, scripting, etc. by me
